tool_description: This is an API that collects news about renewable energy from various sources.
name: Renewable Energy News
title: Renewable Energy News

api_list.name: news
api_list.description: This page collects the news results from all the sources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://renewable-energy-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "renewable-energy-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://renewable-energy-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "renewable-energy-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
